name: the adventurous beans
description:
Adventurous Beans is a game for youth to explore, converse about life choices, express positive emotions and solve interesting puzzles together in a multiplayer platformer inflatable world (360 perspective). Where the beans (player character) jump, slide and collect shapes to solve puzzles in set time. We have several NPCs and a special mentor player per room/ level who make the youth feel empowered, and have positive mindset. The game ends in a quick timed session with player getting badges and feedback, with motivation to come and solve all the puzzles with new players. 

GDD can be download from here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/157pd16Zg5JdkXHP-RWqyjyvvWvWNecBR/view?usp=sharing
